channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- UAA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- UAA

item.title: CVE-2018-15761|2024-08-05T10:01:54.594Z -- cloud%20foundry -- uaa
item.description: Cloud Foundry UAA release, versions prior to v64.0, and UAA, versions prior to 4.23.0, contains a validation error which allows for privilege escalation. A remote authenticated user may modify the url and content of a consent page to gain a token with arbitrary scopes that escalates their privileges.
